abilities.name: Crystal Body
abilities.effect: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, other than damage, done to Suicune. This power stops working while Suicune is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Aurora Wave
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If both are heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If only 1 is heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
